jd: From: Anju Pathak, Tek Inspirations LLC anju.pathak@tekinspirations.com Reply to: anju.pathak@tekinspirations.com Job Description -Title : Business Analyst (Funds Accounting)Location : Quincy, MA (Hybrid)Duration : 6+ monthMOI : SkypeMust have Visa, DL, LinkedinMust have 8+ years of exp.About the jobJob Title: Business Analyst (Funds Accounting)Location: Quincy, MA (Hybrid)Job Overview:We are looking for a detail-oriented Business Analyst with a strong background in funds accounting and financial data analysis. In this hybrid role, you will leverage your expertise to analyze and transform financial data, ensuring it meets client needs.Key Responsibilities:Analyze financial data across the trade lifecycle, focusing on positions, transactions, and income across various asset classes, including derivatives.Utilize a financial background, preferably in custody or back-office operations, to inform your analysis.Conduct in-depth data analysis using SQL and Excel, identifying common components across different datasets and defining normalization strategies.Apply functional business knowledge to derive platform requirements effectively.Transform complex data into useful data marts for clients and stakeholders.Perform gap analysis between data sources and existing data models to identify necessary model enhancements.Contribute to the implementation of software and data services.Communicate effectively, summarizing key points succinctly while providing detailed explanations as needed.Collaborate within a global team environment, fostering a cooperative and supportive atmosphere.Demonstrate a strong sense of responsibility and attention to detail in all tasks.Adapt flexibly to changing role requirements and evolving project needs.Exhibit self-motivation and independence in your workQualificationsRequirements 5+ years of work experience with Fund Accounting7+ years of work experience with SQL5+ years of work experience with Business Analysis
